summary: **Despicable Me 2** is an animated comedy about Gru, a retired supervillain. He's asked to help find a powerful stolen substance. Gru teams up with secret agent Lucy Wilde to stop El Macho, another supervillain. The movie is full of humor and bright animation. It was made after the first *Despicable Me* film was a hit. Many of the same people worked on it, and new actors like Benjamin Bratt joined. The film made a lot of money and was well-liked by critics. It even got nominated for awards.
title: Despicable Me 2
